name: Face with Symbols on Mouth
meaning: The Face with Symbols on Mouth emoji represents extreme anger, rage, or censored swearing. It is used to express intense frustration, outrage, or loss of patience when emotions are so strong that words feel inappropriate or unprintable.

when_to_use: Use this emoji when expressing extreme anger, outrage, or censored swearing in informal conversations.
when_not_to_use: Avoid using it in professional, respectful, or sensitive discussions where aggressive emotion would be inappropriate.
